questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' separation and subsequent two-year hiatus, as well as the introduction of the Eleven Supernovas. What is...?
This arc features a battle on an island with a giant tree, where Luffy and crew face off against a Warlord of the Sea and a corrupt king. What is...?
This arc features Luffy's desperate battle at Marineford to save his brother Ace, leading to a war between the Marines and Whitebeard's pirates. What is...?
This technique, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows the user to create and manipulate poison. What is...?
This technique, used by a certain pirate captain, involves creating a giant spectral elephant. What is...?
questions.answer: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth

questions.question: This technique, utilized by a member of the Straw Hat Pirates, involves creating an illusion of multiple copies. What is...?
This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
This leader of the Beasts Pirates, known for his immense strength and Dragon-Dragon Fruit power, is one of the Four Emperors of the Sea. Who is...?
This character, a former Revolutionary Army commander, is known for his ability to create destructive earthquakes with the Gura Gura no Mi. Who is...?
